column4: anyone know a decently good webdesign program that i can run on ubuntu ?
witch of those are the best? ever tried any of them ?
I've tried the three.  Depends what you mean with web-design.... You wanna a Dreamweaver substitute?
there's is no Dreamweaver substitute... Try Amaya first.  If you don't like, just purge it...  And gonna installing the others and testing.
«sudo apt-get install wine» and try it... It's easy.
